Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Proficient (shows most elements clearly and correctly)
CAN: The student can draw a string telephone that depicts the basic setup with two students, cups, and a string, clearly showing the connection between them.
The student can illustrate the string stretched taut between the two cups, correctly showing how sound can travel through the string.
The student can include labels for key parts such as the 'cup', 'string', and 'sound waves', demonstrating an understanding of the communication process.
The student can show the two students holding the cups to their mouths and ears, illustrating the concept of sending and receiving sound.
CANNOT: The student may struggle with showing how sound actually travels through the string, potentially lacking arrows or waves to represent this (minor gap in symbolic representation).
The student may not fully depict how and why the materials (like the cups and string) are specifically used for sound transmission (student might have partial understanding of material properties).
